about_the_game:
After a tragedy, UKNON Jones, Guynelk and Elsa decide to meet Doctor Gamma to save their friends.
Explore this open world and find all the hidden G-atoms in the world to power the time machine from the
doctor to hope to change things!

Main Features :
-Cross this vast world with varied environments, alone or in local multiplayer.
-Use your different items like a drone that stuns enemies and monitors the surroundings, or the X-bomb that can create explosions.
-Face increasingly difficult bosses and find their weak point.
-Participate in various mini-games or compete against your friends in split screen.
-Chat with an in-game AI or scanning a QR code can reveal a character to help you defeat your enemies.
-Take advantage of certain powers such as the ability to be giant, reverse gravity or jump very high.
-Take photos of enemies or characters to get information about them in this game created by one person.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 1030
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 5800H with Radeon Graphics
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 3060
  • Storage: 14 GB available space

short_description: After a tragedy, UKNON Jones, Guynelk and Elsa decide to meet the doctor Gamma to save their friends. Explore this open world and find all the hidden G-atoms in the world to power the time machine from the doctor to hope to change things!
supported_languages:
English, French*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
